item.title: General Information
item.description: This is the course website of CI 5371 - Learning Analytics: Theory and Practice offered in Fall ‘18 at the University of Minnesota. This course is fully online. All content published on this website is open to the public. Instructor: Bodong Chen, Assistant Professor in Learning Technologies Important Links Syllabus (public) Slack community (invitation only) Hypothes.is group (invitation only) Hypothes.is public annotations - tag:LAUMN (public) Twitter hashtag #LAUMN (public)
